name: mantrae
description: Mantrae is a self-hosted tool that helps users create and manage personal mantras for daily inspiration. It organizes affirmations into collections and presents them in a clean interface with reminders.
features: Mantra collections: Organize affirmations and mantras into themed collections for different purposes.
Daily reminders: Schedule notifications to display mantras at specific times throughout the day.
Random selection: Display a random mantra from your collection for daily inspiration.
Custom mantras: Create and edit personal affirmations with custom text and formatting.
Desktop app: Native application for Linux, Windows, and macOS with system tray integration.
Minimal interface: Clean, distraction-free design focuses attention on the mantra content.
Import/export: Share mantra collections or backup your affirmations in standard formats.
Meditation timer: Built-in timer for meditation sessions with mantra display.
Offline access: All mantras stored locally for access without internet connection.
Customizable display: Adjust font size, colors, and display duration to suit your preferences.
